name: Super Dino Adventure !
description:
Super Dino Adventure ! is a hidden-gem that's definitely worth checking out if you're a fan of endless running Game
Help Dino the dinosaur make his way through wildneress!
Tap to get Dino to jump over obstacles, Enimies . Score by eating Lot of fruit to help Dino survive and Run in enless jungle .
You can make Dino fly, run, or even smash up adversaries… but whatever you do, remember to keep feeding him fruit along the way.
Both skill and determination will be needed to survive this fruitfull Jungle adventure.
Boasting superb graphics, fantastic gameplay and great replay value, Dino Rush is an addictive and deliciously fun adventure for the whole family.
Tap to jump and get ready to save a dinosaur
